title: 2020GD
author: 2020GD
content: Hi there,I need someone to create a fantastic signature for me. You can reply here or PM me, no matter. Show me the examples of your previous works before we can continue the discussion. If you know someone who can create an impressive signature, let me know.Thank you in advance!!!

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: You posted on the wrong section, it's better to be aligned on the Services assuming that you'll pay in BTC.And for the summary of most of the designers here, you'll see each of their portfolios through the overview.Overview of Bitcointalk Designers(Signature,Avatar,etc)

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: 2020GD on May 09, 2022, 07:34:54 PMI need someone to create a fantastic signature for me. You can reply here or PM me, no matter. Show me the examples of your previous works before we can continue the discussion. If you know someone who can create an impressive signature, let me know.Do you need someone to manage your new campaign in forum or just design for signature?Maybe you can hire someone to make you whole package with better price instead of purchasing everything separately.I would recommend contacting manager Hhampuz and he can help you with everything you need with campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=881377I think he is working with Jayce for creating signatures: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0

comments.author: Erdogan
comments.body: This announcement should appear in the Services section.You don't need to create a new thread there. You can move this one by using menu with tool at the bottom of the page and selecting the appropriate section, that is: Bitcoin Forum > Economy > Marketplace > Services - here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0Ps. I also recommend Jayce as the signatures creator: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Try contacting jayce for designing your own signature. jayce have already made signatures many times and you can find some of his work in this forum. Some of jayce customers are a casino with good reputation and you can check jayce's work in here ----JAYCE DESIGNS---- Logo, Avatar, Signature, Banner, etc.. Try sending a DM to jayce that you looking for a signature creator. I guess you wanted someone to create a signature for you and if the signature is for a signature campaign then I recommend Hhampuz for that task.
